Detailed Description

LDLM pool structure to track granted locks.

For purposes of determining when to release locks on e.g. memory pressure. This feature is commonly referred to as lru_resize.

atomic_t ldlm_pool::pl_lock_volume_factor

Lock volume factor.

SLV on client is calculated as following: server_slv * lock_volume_factor.
